statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ 2 \\ -1 \\ 2 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ -3 \\ 3 \\ 3 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -8 \\ 8 \\ -10 \\ -16 \\ -12 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -11 \\ 17 \\ -19 \\ -25 \\ -18 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ 3 \\ -3 \\ 0 \\ -2 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
